1.title: Hot and Cold

episode of.title: First Games with Sammy and Eve (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Squirrel friends Sammy and Eve are back at it again and hiding acorns from each other - in the living, at the beach and on the farm.

2.title: Hide the Acorn

episode of.title: First Games with Sammy and Eve (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Today, Sammy and Eve hide the acorn in all different places in their world including the bedroom, the garden and even around the swimming pool.

3.title: Adventures

episode of.title: First Games with Sammy and Eve (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Watch with your child as squirrel friends Sammy and Eve hide the acorn in all different places - in the nursery, the garage and the tool shed.

4.title: Squirreling Around

episode of.title: First Games with Sammy and Eve (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Play along as these squirrel friends play hide and seek in the vegetable garden, the dog house, and at the park.

imdb.title: First Games with Sammy and Eve
akas: First Games with Sammy and Eve (United States)
plot: Squirrel friends, Sammy and Eve invite kids to partake in their favorite game: Hot and Cold. First, each squirrel takes turns hiding an acorn from one another.
